titlestmt.titleproper: New York Environmental News (NYEN); Collection ua450.001
titlestmt.author: Miles Lawlor

publicationstmt.publisher: M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections & Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2020-09-03 13:41:25 -0400.

repository.corpname: M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections & Archives

did.abstract: This collection is made up of issues of New York Environmental News, a newsletter focused on environmental issues in New York state.
did.physloc: The materials are located onsite in the department.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Processed in 2018 by Miles Lawlor. The materials making up this collection were removed from the University Publications Collection to create a new collection.

bioghist.head: Administrative History
bioghist.p: New York Environmental News (NYEN) first began publishing in 1973 as a weekly publicaton under the editorship of Rosemary Nichols, a university professor affiliated with the Environmental Studies program. Starting with its third volume, the newsletter changed to a biweekly format. The fifth edition of the newsletter in 1978 saw the newsletter come under the leadership of the Atmospheric Sciences Research Center. After 1985, the newsletter was published by the Office of University Relations. The newlsetter contained information about environmental issues and legislation in New York State.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection is made up of issues of the newsletter New York Environmental News (NYEN), covering a period from 1973 through 1988. The magazine itself focused on environmental issues and legislation in New York State. Holdings are complete for most years.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Files in this collection are arranged chronologically.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: All items in this collection were transferred to the University Libraries, M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is unrestricted.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: This page may contain links to digital objects. Access to these images and the technical capacity to download them does not imply permission for re-use. Digital objects may be used freely for personal reference use, referred to, or linked to from other web sites.
Researchers do not have permission to publish or disseminate material from these collections without permission from an archivist and/or the copyright holder.

The researcher assumes full responsibility for conforming to the laws of copyright. Some materials in these collections may be protected by the U.S. Copyright Law (Title 17, U.S.C.) and/or by the copyright or neighboring-rights laws of other nations. More information about U.S. Copyright is provided by the Copyright Office. Additionally, re-use may be restricted by terms of University Libraries gift or purchase agreements, donor restrictions, privacy and publicity rights, licensing and trademarks.

The M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collection and Archives is eager to hear from any copyright owners who are not properly identified so that appropriate information may be provided in the future.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Preferred citation for this material is as follows: Identification of specific item, series, box, folder, New York Environmental News (NYEN) Collection, 1973-1988. M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives, University Libraries, University at Albany, State University of New York (hereafter referred to as the NYEN Collection).
